column4: I'm on a remote box, and I just noticed my fstab looks weird: "UUID=d8bdee75-489b-4043-8744-e6e4d028c836 /               xfs     defaults        0       1"
is that something screwed up, or is that normal
I'm afraid to reboot it to find out, b/c I'd have to drive 3 hours :)
you can verify the uuid with 'blkid'
